page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT IN ELMLEY CASTLE
page.content: There is little employment within the area.Market gardening is the main occupation,employing only a few individuals mainly on a seasonal basis.Farms provide some permanent jobs and casual labour during pea picking,fruit picking etc.A large proportion of the population are retired and the majority of the remainder commute to neighbouring towns and to Birmingham.They include professional people,workers in industry,agriculture,shops and the building trade.A few are self-employed offering services including painting and decorating,plumbing and electrical contracting.Unemployment is not a serious problem.
